content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft the granite wall, I need to place granite blocks in a 3x3 grid. I will start by moving the first granite block to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 5, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed the first granite block, and now I need to place the second one next to it. I will move the second granite block to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: I have placed the second granite block, and now I need to place the third one next to it. I will move the third granite block to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed the first row of granite blocks, I need to place the second row. I will move the first granite block of the second row to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 2, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed the first granite block of the second row, I need to place the second one next to it. I will move the second granite block to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed the second granite block of the second row, I need to place the third one next to it. I will move the third granite block to slot 6, which is to the right of slot 5.
Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have placed all the granite blocks, I can craft the granite wall. I will move the granite wall to an empty slot in my inventory, such as slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
